Dialogue.Page: Just kidding, I am me. I have climbed this tree in search of my cat...
But I then remembered that my cat doesn't climb trees!
If you are listening to this recording, I must have once again forgotten this. I hope I can stop forgetting in the future...
He is a very well-behaved cat, not climbing up trees.
Hmm... but if this wasn't where I last saw my cat, where was it...
I know! It wasn't a tree, it was that Dim Thorn orbiting around the edge of the star system!
